code: import{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[output,setOutput]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleCommand=async()=>{setLoading(true);setOutput('');try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/beautify',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({input})});const result=await response.json();if(result.status==='success'){setOutput(result.data);}else{setOutput(`Erro: ${result.message}`);}}catch(error){setOutput(`Erro: ${error.message}`);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"app-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Beautify Code"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"textarea",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"Insira o seu c\xF3digo aqui:","aria-label":"Input para o c\xF3digo"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Output"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"textarea",value:output,readOnly:true,placeholder:"Sua sa\xEDda vai aparecer aqui:","aria-label":"Sa\xEDda do c\xF3digo processado"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Processando..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCommand('beautify'),children:"Beautify JSON"})})})]});}export default App;
